title: Texas Firm Recalls Chicken and Beef Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: EDITOR'S NOTE: Details of this recall were updated on Dec. 31, 2014 to reflect additional product. The production end date has been corrected to Dec. 15, 2014. WASHINGTON, December 30, 2014 J & B Sausage Co., a Waelder, Texas establishment, is recalling an additional 9,909...
impacted_products: 12-oz. packages of fully cooked “CAJUN HOLLAR BRAND INC. CREOLE STYLE BOUDIN.”
